title: aria-placeholder test
description: A suite of tests for aria-placeholder

chrome.output: "M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"My birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, type in text"
"Your birthday" is said before entering text field on next down arrow press
"Your birthday, edit, type in text"
"M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"His birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y"
"1 2 dash 2 5 dash 2 0 0 0, edit"
"Her birthday, edit, 1 2 dash 2 5 dash 2 0 0 0"

edge.output: "MM dash DD dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"My birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, type in text"
"Your birthday" is said before entering text field on next down arrow press
"Your birthday, edit, type in text"
"M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"His birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, type in text"
edge.notes: Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder

edge.output: "1 2 dash 2 5 dash 2 0 0 0, edit"
"Her birthday, edit, 1 2 dash 2 5 dash 2 0 0 0"

firefox.output: "MM dash DD dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"My birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, type in text"
"input left bracket type equals text right bracket, aria dash placeholder defined, unlabelled, edit, Your birthday, type in text"
"His birthday, edit, 10 characters, type in text"
firefox.notes: Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder
